info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:12PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of central Deer Lodge, Silver Bow and southeastern Powell Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Helena to 11 miles southwest of Basin to 16 miles northwest of Divide. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Butte, Anaconda, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Warm Springs, Galen, Gregson Hot Springs, Divide, Nissler, Crackerville, Fishtrap, Avon, Racetrack, Opportunity, Blossburg, Ramsay, Janney, Newcomb and Elliston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 181 and 230. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 10 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
